content.detailedDescription: I was viewing soho images (of the sun) and noticed an unusual shape next to a star or planet that was not in any of the other photographs taken. in comparison to the heavenly body it would have to be very large. it was taken at 230am on july 13, 2016.
content.summary: Image caught on soho of large 'angel' shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
Another witness and i were up early in the morning and they pointed the object out through a window. at first, i thought the object was some sort of aircraft but noticed that it didn't move and there were no blinking lights. the object was completely stationary and had one red center light and four yellow-white lights. the four yellow-white lights were around the red light and in a diamond formation.

the object stayed in one place, not moving, and was either above or near the large power transmission lines that were less than a mile from our vantage point. i watched the object for around half an hour before falling asleep, not seeing it move at all during that time.
content.summary: Red light in the center, with four surrounding yellow-white lights, in a diamond pattern

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I kept reading about planet x or nibiru getting closer, and it was behind the sun.  now i don't know about there actually being another planet coming toward us, but i decided i would take some pictures of the sun over a duration of 21 days or more, first with a regular camera and then with a camera with a special infra-red lens.   each day i would get several photographs and would see round orbs near the sun. some small and some very large.
 
still not convinced i was really seeing anything other than maybe sun glares, i kept on shooting until i caught a very large object near the sun that may be responsible for the orbs.  it seems to be projecting a shield of sorts or a cloak beneath it that changed from perfectly round to more oblong.  the object itself was circular and appeared to have 3 levels. the edges were perfect in detail. 

it also seemed to be drawing energy from the sun in a narrow stream into the ufo.  
i caught images of this object on two different days and now it seems to be gone. the glow is still there, so i'm guessing it's back in hiding or is it another one?  

now, i'm almost convinced that there is no planet x hanging around up there but very, very large ufo's. 

i'm almost sure that what i saw and/or seeing can be seen from anywhere in the world using a special camera that can cut through our blue atmosphere.
content.summary: Pictures taken of large disk ufo or anomally near the sun. appears to be cloaking.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were staying with relatives on the inter-coastal waterway. we were observing the planet mars, which was very bright that night. very near to where we were looking, 3 star-like lights appeared out of nowhere, forming an elongated triangle shape. we watched them hover in the sky at what appeared to be a high altitude, and over the ocean. we watched them for a couple minutes. we both saw the same objects, and commented about them to each other as to what they were. i thought at first they had to be aircraft. but there were absolutely no running lights observed (i am a private pilot)...No anti-collision, strobe, nav, or landing lights. they were a solid white-yellow color. they did not twinkle like stars, and looked more like very bright satellites, but at comparatively low altitude to satellites. after a couple minutes not moving, they began to move in different directions simultaneously, silently. the two lights forming the base just seemed to disappear, while the top light forming the highest point of the triangle moved quickly straight up into space. my sister and i were stunned. it didn't frighten us, but we were amazed that what we observed was something neither of us could explain.
content.summary: 3 star-like lights appeared at night out of nowhere, forming an elongated triangle shape. they hovered stationary at high altitude, then quickly split up in different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
Okay i normally do not post stuff like this - but too much of a coincidence. especially with news on nasa spacestation feed going blank on july 9th also.  on july 9th i, my son, his friend and my wife were at soldier field in chicago illinois. we were there watching the usa vs south africa womens soccer game. it was around half time and i looked up in the blue sky and there was a huge thing that looked as bright as a star. the sun was hitting it perfect against the blue background.
 i took 4 pictures of this at separate times as it was drifting very slow across the sky. every picture i took it had changed shapes. i was using a canon powershot sx50 hs - which is 50 times optical or 1200mm. the pictures were taken with the lens fully extended. i will post pictures next.
content.summary: Looked like as bright as a star at 1:00pm in the afternoon.

content.detailedDescription: Two adults driving south on i-79 just past i-68 exit south of morgantown at 10:43 pm. spotted two bright orange lights to our south (our direction of travel) initially appearing as orbs. the one on the right was higher in altitude. their flight path was straight, parallel with i-79 and headed north east towards downtown morgantown. as we drove past (objects on our left, across the highway), they appeared as geometric glass pyramid/diamonds filled with fire or flickering/pulsing brilliant light. i thought "chinese lanterns?" but these were much larger and not clearly not paper or rounded. not to mention, why would just two chinese lanterns be released at 10:43 pm on a wednesday night. they were moving at approx. 35 mph. the object closest to me was observed at less than 100 yds., just 100 ft. above treetops. they smoothly flew right on by us. there were a few other vehicles nearby who may have seen the objects as well. their flight path was perfectly level and we did not observe them change path or maneuver. it is possible they were part of a singular larger object, although they appeared as independent but identical objects with no connecting structure. we were traveling at 75 mph and didn't slow down to observe. my passenger looked out back window and watched them until they were out of sight of our vehicle. moments later, observed a jet on final to clarksburg/bridgeport airport. it is likely the objects' and the jet's paths intersected, albeit at differing altitudes. would like to know if pilot saw objects too or if showed up on either mgw or ckb radars. see attached digital rendering i did this morning while it was fresh in mind.
content.summary: Couple observed two flickering orange diamond/pyramid object pass nearby at low altitude near interstate.

content.detailedDescription:
I think i saw a ufo today? at about 2:45 pm, time approximated. i know it was after 2:30 and not yet three o’clock. 
 i saw a shiny cylinder or possible disk? bright and sunny day as you know if you are in the valley area today.
i watched it as i’m driving. i’m on 4000 west and about 4400 south when i first saw it. it just stood out as odd to me. it was moving very slow in a southwest direction. i looked and looked and could not see a tail fin. 
 it looked wider, longer than a commercial jet. silver white with sunlight reflecting off it and at times a hint of grey.
moving in a vehicle it almost appeared not to be moving.
i stop at a signal light and watch to see it better. 
it is slowly moving. the leading side seemed to be tilted down slightly in the direction it went. the flight appeared very level and steady. while stopped at the signal light.... i seen it change direction and the size of its shape did not change at all. this made me think it was a disk shape. direction change and it still appears to be the same shape. (direction change from southwest to a western heading) at the stop light i can see it with the view of telephone poles and wires to easily judge it movement against a clear blue sky.
after the change of direction and not before or during.... after the direction change i seen it tilt on a near 45 degree angle and is barely moving. it appears to be heading more west now.
the light changes so i take off and drive into a smiths grocery store parking lot. i’m watching it as best i can driving, it is slow moving.
i took my eyes and peripheral vision off it as i turned in the parking lot. 
then i don’t see it again.
i drove straight to a parking spot which took seconds. 
i hurried out of the truck to look for the object. 
i don't see it.
i looked and looked. 
i tried to guess by speed and direction where it might be etc.
i never saw it again.
no jets or anything either.
i sense some people looking at me as to why i'm starring at the sky so long.
weird looks from people wondering what i’m looking for in the sky, ignore them.
no one spoke to me as to why.
i carefully scan the whole sky in the direction it was heading etc. 
so then i scan to look carefully all around, the whole sky again and again. i even look where i think it could not have gone even at a speed of a jet.
i was very careful to look intently and not to over look any section of the sky.
i never seen it again.
it had been moving slow when i last saw it.
it was not even half way across the salt lake valley heading southwest when i was driving into the parking lot. 
if it was a jet, there was no way it could have gone from sight in that length of time i took my eyes from it to park. 
the whole time i saw it, the object was moving too slow for a jet. 
it was an 1/8 longer, wider than a commercial jet from nose to tip.
it was about as thick as the body of a jet.
i went in the store and buy tomatoes and milk. i come back out in the parking lot. i watched long enough to see a few jets near the same distance the object was.
i could easily see they have a tail fins. 
what i seen i could never see a tail fin on it. 
no tail fin and the fact it just seemed to disappear made me feel it had to have been a ufo.
i would feel better if i had a chance to view it with binoculars and know where it went.
to see no tail fin, i can accept. how it was not to be found again in a few seconds of taking my eyes off it. that was the main alarming thing to me. that i could not explain away.
content.summary: Large cylindrical object flying over salt lake valley midday

content.detailedDescription:
I had just stepped outside like i do almost any nice night to sit, enjoy the nice weather and look at the stars. i had been sitting for only a minute or two when an object that i can only describe as a star-like came into view from behind the tall tree line to my northwest. i immediately jumped up out of my chair and in my head i said holy s#!T, it's a ufo. as i watched the object track to the southeast and behind some trees behind my house i started to second guess myself thinking, no it can't be (as it was being partly obscured by trees, not yet having full foliage). i then thought to get my iphone out and because it was so dark shoot a rapid series of photos just in case this object was not known (shooting photos gave me more light then shooting a video). as i am shooting the photos i am going back and forth in my mind what this is. is it something known, is it a ufo? i live in the flight path of a major airport and grew up near this airport so i am very firmiliar with flight paths and what airplanes and helicopters look like (i have never seen a light like this before or since, as i noted, the only way i can describe it is as a fast moving, close star). i made the conscious decision to get my neighboors satellite dish in the photos for scale (and possible speed estimates, although i do not know if this is possible?). i took around 109 photos of the object and stopped to watch it the last few seconds before it was to disappear behind the roof line of my neighboors house. approximately 5-10 seconds after i stopped shooting (convienient right?!?) the object made an abrupt turn (although not a right angle but more of an acute curve, absolutely not possible by any know aircraft of any country today). i then watched the object in complete astonishment on a path directly away from my position (and the earth) over the next 10-15 seconds (maybe 20?) slowly get smaller until i could no longer see it. 
  from that night on i have almost an obsession with looking at the sky in hopes of seeing this object again. i know that i probably never will but i still hope i can because it was like no light source i have ever seen and obviously made maneuvers that i have never seen or even though possible. upon reviewing my photos i noticed that there looks to be a small private plane in the foreground and would think that there would be no way the pilot could not have seen this object unless it's altitude was much more than the aircraft. i so desperately want to know if anyone else saw this object. if this object was military tech then we are a thousand years ahead technologically from where we are told. if i had to equate the light to something known (other than a star) i would say it was like an white/ bluish-white led.
content.summary: Starlike orb moving, turning away from earth, watched till not visible

content.detailedDescription:
on a beautiful day in 2015., i was sitting on my back deck, under the eaves of the house, that faces east.  i did look east , but not observing anything unusual.    i then looked up, and toward the north and above the my trees , on my property.  i observed one ufo, that was low and it's speed was slow, like at cruising speed. not in a hurry.  the bottom of the craft was like a darker copper color. it moved west , toward grand lake st.Marys, then  out of my view of sight., because of my eaves of my house.    

 then i looked down, thinking about what i saw, and decided to look up again., this when i saw the 2nd ufo. same shape, color and speed. the only differences were;  the 2nd one was a bit closer, and had an appendage on it's south side.  like a round tube, that was maybe , half the radius of the ship.  then it was out of my line of sight.    

 i am puzzled by the fact; why i didn't get off my chair, and run to the west side of the house, to view the ufo's or even right down the date of this event.  possibly., i was effected by this event.   

                                             thank you.
 

 i don't remember the month or day.
content.summary: Two ufo's . less than 30 seconds observed.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of july seventh 2016  9;30pm. i was driving down east ridge road or landfill road when i noticed a mile east of me was a bright light  the size of a large star. bigger than venus is in the night sky. this was as i made the first hill past our landfill heading south . it was dark and i stopped to see if it was a star because i thought it was not a star. it the ufo sat stationary about five hundred feet off the ground. the ground being a hill with two radio towers on it. the ufo sat in the air between the towers. it i think seen my headlights pointed in its direction and  turned its light off after two minutes. i seen no ship because of the darkness. no blinking lights were present on the craft.
content.summary: Star like light hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at k-mart here in sheridan, wyoming looking at a large dark blue bank of clouds east of me when i noticed a cage like structure flying along side of the cloud. it had to be big in size because cloud was about 15  miles from me and ufo was about a quarter inch long and an eighth inch wide. i could see the cloud through the cage bar structure.  ufo was moving from north to south fast as a fighter jet along the cloud then flew into the cloud and vanished. this was about 8:15 pm . 07-03-2016. ufo sighting lasted10 seconds at the most.
content.summary: cage shaped ufo east of city.

content.detailedDescription:
Stormie m ashbrook 
2705 sanibel blvd
saint james city, florida 33956



to whom this may concern:

      hello. my name is stormie ashbrook. i am almost 32 years old and have been a resident of cape coral/pine island florida for about 28 years now. i like to think that i know the area very well and i am familiar with most normal flight paths around. what myself and two other people saw in the night sky on july 8, 2016 was not normal in the least.

       i was driving home with a friend around 10:00 - 10:30 pm est on this friday night when i just happened to glance over to my left. at first i didn't think much about it. it was only 4 lights at first. as i kept looking over to my left, paying closer and closer attention to them, there were suddenly more of them, and they were grouping up with each other somehow. i immediately pulled over into a gas station parking lot and parked the car facing south toward the lights. by this time it had been about 4 minutes since i first noticed them. 
       after watching these things for a few minutes just the two of us, another car pulled up next to me, asking if we had any ideap what these strange lights were. he, too, had a cellphone camera out, with no luck in getting any sort of video or picture of them. now the 3 of us are watching these things move around and  witnessing their amazing and otherworldly maneuvering capabilities for a good 6-10 minutes until they started to disappear. they disappeared one at a time over a period of about 4-5 minutes,  the first two going straight up into the sky, no sounds or big light trails to note.  another would start to move more noticeably, a couple of them eventually taking a more normal flight pattern and heading to the south or southwest, fading away til gone. the others seemed to just fade away into the dark night sky, again, always one at a time. after a total of about 15 minutes, they were all gone. 
the only video that came out with anything will prove only that someone else, someone not in the car with us originally, stopped for the same reason we did... to safely witness what i know was an amazing atmospheric anomaly! it was an experience that i will never forget and i am more interested in the unknown now than i've ever been. i will know that there is more out there than just us humans. there must be. 
thank you for your time, and i hope to hear from you soon!
 p.S.- i've included a cellphone video of very bad visual quality, so it definitely doesn't document anything paranormal. i included it because it shows proof of the other person who stopped with me to look at them. so only audio is feasible. 
thank you,again!

best regards,
stormie marie ashbrook
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Multiple red lights hover over sw florida

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were walking 2 dogs and looking up at stars when from the se an unknown craft with 2 red lights; one larger pulsating red light and one smaller non-pulsating light were visible. distinguishing features were not visible but seemed to view it from its side although it may have been cylindrical or the side of a belgian triangle shaped craft. no sound or trail was present or emitted. duration lasted approximately 2 minutes or less before silently disappearing from view due to the tree line heading nw. was moving too fast for a plane, did not have the light nor apparent body configuration of a plane, helicopter, or size and shape of a drone. initial reaction was of curiosity turning into determination to look online for similar videos or pictures.
content.summary: 2 red lights one large pulsating seemingly at center of craft, small red light at rear non blinking both very bright.

content.detailedDescription: Need help looking through faith 7 photos to find the ufo gordon cooper talks about as i am positive i have the photos he talks about.
content.summary: I have gordon coopers photos

content.detailedDescription:
I reported a. innocident that had happened to me when i was much younger that occurred during hurricane katrina back in late august of 2005. only reason i remember the approximate data was because my birthday was near the day that horrible hurricane had hit my home town.  

ever since this occurance with this ufo; it felt as if i have been marked...  i have been been having very livid dreams that seems so real....  dreams that until this tuesday morning around 3am......  before daylight is all i know since i actually went to bed around 9-10pm....  just moments before this encounter that dang near has me at wits end.  

i am definitely thinking of having a psychotics  hypytise me to tell me if what i saw was reality or fiction. all i remember was the feeling of my body being paralyzed and could not move my arms or legs as if it was a weight pushing my arms and legs down onto my bed.  all i know was my back were facing away from the direction i was being pulled.  i fought hard to turn my neck and saw five figures standing outside my room....  as if the wall was tore down or they somehow turned my wall into a transparent liquid like water.   all i could think of was please don't hurt me.... and please help me with this severe pain levels i am going through everyday. 
all i know is all i could do was turn my neck to see what was pulling me in this direction and it was less than 10 seconds after turning my neck it was as if they gave me some kind of drug or something that knocked me out cold and i woke up laying flat on my back around 8pm that night.  i remember before i looked at these entities it felt as if something were crawling inside my spinal cord and this feeling is what woke me up. as if i was getting probed or something literally crawling inside my spinal cord.... but with no pain at all.  it felt as if i were being scanned like back in 2005.  i know what muscle spasms feels like....  this is nothing like such. 

these five figures i saw is like burnt into my memory before i was knocked back out cold.  and if it was a dream....  why do i feel since tuesday as if i had a surgery of some sort.  i feel extremely sore that i have barely left bed in the last 2 days. one thing i have noticed thou....  i have been trying to reteach myself computer programming ever since november 2015. in the last two days i have made more progress than i have in several months    

so maybe this aduction isn't for the worst.  it's as if my brain is running in overdrive since this encounter real or not real i have no proof. i only know i had to leave a job making $35 a hour working for at&t in november 2014.  i couldn't function...  walking became extremely painful. standing up and working aloft as a lineman became impossible to continue to carry on. i am starting to fill they are here to help if they could.  but one thing i can say for certain is they scare the crap out of me when taken without your consent or knowledge of what is going on.
content.summary: No ufo.  i was sleeping and felt my body feel as if it was being pulled from my bed. i looked in the direction of being pulled and saw 5 light brown and light green figures with hugh eyes. my entire wall was transparent.

content.detailedDescription: I was cooking on my grill when the object appeared to be a falling star... so i ran towards it to get a better look and it shifted once... then again... then i could make out clearly that it was disc in shape... and reflective by the reflection of entry burn on it surface... yet it was at a much lower altitude to show entry burns.... then it disappeaed down the horizon... total time of visual iterception: 9 seconds (max)... distance: between 10 and 20 miles... i know this having been a flyboy in the us air force back in the 90's.... it's girth matched a c5
content.summary: Ufo sighting in laredo

content.detailedDescription: I went for a walk on the bird walk called kipuka puaulu at volcano national park in volcano, hawaii to take photos of protected and rare species of birds and nature. however, when my photos were reviewed later, i found more than birds and trees in a number of my photos. there were unexplainable images; from an indian spirit, demons, japanese writing across the photo, odd glowing objects in the woods, etc. to this photo, which looks very much like an et right in from of me evidenced by her facial features. i have tried to figure this all out and thought maybe the activity of the volcano kilauea or the fact, it is located on the volcano fault has something to do with the "hotspot" or "energy". it may not be an et, but this is just my observation.
content.summary: Surprised photo of entity

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 11pm. me and my wife were sitting in garage and she noticed a light in the sky and asked me if it was a plane. i said yeah tbe army depot is that way. she said it's moving to fast to be a plane. i looked at what she was looking at and it covered a distance that made me think it was a drone that was close by. i had to run out of garage to follow its path, which would stop and reverse then go forward and repear about every two seconds. it would change from white light to red and back again.
i really didnt think much about it but we timed the object which we now knew it wasn't a drone or plane cause it shot straight up into a lightning cloud that was going on and that was it.

it covered a distance in 28 seconds that covered miles then came back and went into the lightning clouds! thats when i tried to record it, in its way back.

i've never witnessed a ufo or something i couldn't explain away.
this i can't. i keep replaying it over in my head to find reason for it.
i can't.
content.summary: Object covered a distance and made changes that could not be explained then shot into a lighting cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I was out visiting my grandmother for the night. and me, being a photographer, went down to the beach. see, she lives close to the water so it isn't a hassle to get down there or anything. 
anyway, i started off taking a few test shots of the island across the way, trying to get it just right for night shots. not long after, me being in my haste had forgotten the memory card back up at the house. but i still had 10 shots in my memory banks, so i figured i'd use them first. so i did, i used all 10, then started making my way back towards the stairs that lead back onto the road. that's when, out of the corner of my eye, i spot a blinding light. it scared the crap out of me, i jumped, and looked toward it. i couldn't look straight at it because it was so blinding but after a short moment it wasn't as bright anymore, i could actually look at it now. at this late at night there's is no sun at that time of year. and it made night turn to day for those few seconds that it was bright. after it was still quite bright, enough to sparkle against the water anad lighten the evening, but not enough to really have anyone who hadn't already seen it to take notice. now, in my quick thinking i started going through my pictures deleting what i could, trying to save the good ones. i deleted two, but i wanted a shot, i just wanted a picture of it soo bad, i hadn't even though about what it could be at this point. so i plopped the camera down on a ledge, and set it to night capture, and snapped this quick photo before it vanished into thin air. the night darkened and i made my way back. for some reason i felt disturbed by the light and decided to stay in for the evening. it wasn't until my grandfather had spotted the photo that he considered it a ufo. and it's taken him 2 months to convince me to fill out this application. hopefully you fine people can figure out what the hell i saw that night.

i must also apologise for my shaky photography
i would also like to add that this object was completely still, and that i do not believe in extra terrestrials in terms of this situation
content.summary: Very very, bright orb in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was coming from the garage to the house and a reflective shiny object caught my attention. at first i thought it was a para glider because of the semi domed shape. as i observed further i noticed it was barely moving and made no sound. the sun was setting so it was picking up lots of reflection i had been watching for about a minute. as it moved slowly north i was able to see that it was 2 domed objects connected. it seemed to be about 6 to 7,000 ft up. at about 2 minute's of observation i could see it very clearly. i ran to the house to grab the binoculars which are always out. it was out of my sight for about 30 seconds. when i returned it was gone. the reason i reported this is i went to your site thinking about joining because i see so many things like this on a regular basis. as i was watching the flash slide case 74282 came across the screen. i was shocked as this seems to be what i observed. i feel i should start reporting my sightings because they are happening more often than what i would observe a few years back. the last event was sunday evening july 10, i was in the swim spa about 11:00. a huge light came on n.E. it glowed bright for about 6 sec.Then dimmed down. there was a red circle within another red circle. it stayed stationary for about 4-6 sec. elevation seemed to be about 8 to 10,000 ft.,then started to move east very slowly. i observed it for another 8 to 10 sec. then it slowly faded out. i keep the binoculars there and when i scanned the area nothing showed up.
content.summary: I was looking at your site thinking about joining because i see so much activity here.We live between mt. shasta and mt. lassen. i was atching the flash slider showing events etc and then saw case 74282. this same object i observed on date shown

content.detailedDescription: My wife and 2 kids in late summer 1998 just returned to our house in w. islip (south shore long island) from a day trip on fire island. it was near sunset so it was still light out. we were all enjoying the fresh air on the back porch and i noticed a very large black boomerang shaped object pointing and moving north along the treetops that grow along the backwater along the east side of rt 231 up from main st to about the union blvd (which is to the north of the house). several houses in the area. i saw it actually touching and bending the treetops as it moved unaffected and very steadily at about walking speed (3 to 4 mph) northward. when it was parallel to our house it stopped moving. we were kind of excited and i told my wife to quick go get the video recorder. my son doesn't remember this (he was just seven at the time) but he exclaimed, "maybe there are aliens inside!". i was trained as an artist and always had very good vision. i looked carefully for details on the object and i could see that it was faceted and the surface looked velcro like with a little more roughness than actual velcro. i can also say it was very stealthy looking except that i have seen stealth bombers in flight they moved a lot faster had apparent jet propulsion and made noise. this had no props, jets, nor made any noise at all and had no windows etc. only 4 feet in depth at the center so this would not be easy for anyone to be in.  remained in place not moving at tree top level just beyond out backyard fence for several minutes and then very quickly went straight up as my wife came out with the video recorder. by the time she got it turned on it was at about several thousand feet and she got about 30 seconds of video with the boomerang way up in the sky and a jet flying past it. it flexed one of its wings almost making it look elastic before it continued rising straight up and out of sight into the sky. i don't know where that video is. i gave it to a coworker who was a ufo enthusiast, was very interested, and he had seen many on a regular basis when he was living in az. he said they were metallic and ball shaped and constantly jets would chase after them and they would zoom off. but he never figured out what they were. my wife thinks we still have a copy of the video somewhere but i have not come across it (old video cassette). but that is it for this one. i have more incidents i witnessed and will report here as well just for the record. maybe someone else saw this boomerang? if i ever come across the video i will submit it but it doesn't give you as much info as i just did from my visual. video only shows a very distant boomerang silhouetted in the sky, one wing flexes a little then a jet goes past then the battery ran out.
content.summary: Black boomerang 40" wingspan; 4 feet in height; 3 mph going north on the east side of route 231 btween main st. and union blvd; touching treetops; stopped near our backyard fence; hovered still for minutes then straight up into sky - quiet

content.detailedDescription: I was just going to bed,looked out of my window, everything was quite,calm and dark. i suddenly noticed movement above my head watched for about 2 seconds before i lost sight below the house roof opposite, this wing shape craft was travelling at incredible speed with no sound as the window was wide open and no visible light, travelling from west to east of barnstaple, north devon, england. very light cloud cover with a lot of moon light. as this wing disappeared over the horizon i made a note of the time,1240am still in shock and not quite believing what i've just witnessed, thinking did i just make this up! then within seconds the cloud that this wing fly over, lite up from the back an orange glow and then stopped. that showed me that what i had seen had happened. this is the second major sighting in 25 years in devon. i'm still in shock of the incredible speed this craft was travelling at, i have nothing to compare it with, concord used to fly over devon, it made this look like the slowest craft on the planet.
content.summary: Wing shape, flying incredible speed, above house west to east when flying over cloud, cloud lite up briefly.

content.detailedDescription: My family (4 children)  and my spouse were outside in our back yard when our oldest yelled "dad the shiny things are back" as we have seen them 3 days in a row now.  so i walked out to see and sure enough there were three metallic objects flying in what seemed to be a formation. they would go in to a triangular shape then circle with the bottom one switching positions with the one on top. this went on for about ten minutes before one split from the group and shot off to the north disappearing while the other two remained doing their "dance" after a few minutes the third object returned and they resumed their maneuvers. we watched as planes flew by trying to dismiss them as planes but couldn't. they continued to fly within inches other each other rapidly switching directions and positions. after about 30 more minutes they stopped and hovered for a few seconds then started off to the south and then just disappeared altogether. we have been seeing this consistently over the last three days now and after speaking with others have determined that the way they are moving the gforce would tear somebody apart.
content.summary: 3 flying in formation with abrupt stops and direction changes

content.detailedDescription: I was shooting storms in the area, i did not see the object until i viewed the photos later.  this is a common occurrence for me.  i am sending a couple of pictures more that are not related to this particular incident.
content.summary: Showed up in picture - was not in camera viewfinder when shot taken

content.detailedDescription:
I am a priest and about 10:35 pm tuesday july 12
i went from the house to walk over to the church to lock it for the night. 
and there were 3 things in the sky. 
the first one went over the church, looked like a standing up cross, not like a plane which would be a horizontal cross, but instead looked like a vertical cross, at first i thought it was a helicopter with a red and green light. 
but then as it got closer to me, i noticed it was moving like a fire fly, moved stopped for split second moved stopped etc. 
i heard no noise and it was flying rather low, and i thought wow the engine is not running on the helicopter, i wonder if it is going to crash. 
then as it turned i realized it was outlined in lights, red on one side and green on the other. 
it had tons of red lights and green lights -many lights, i am sure more than 20.
very bright lights. this thing continued to move past the church and past the trees. no noise. i was trying to see where it was going, but the tress blocked the view. 

then a 2nd one came with the same kind of lights, but flying like one of our planes, not standing upright. this one had wings and was flying so low i thought it was going to land on my church. the green lights and red lights were so bright, it was incredible. many lights outlining  the craft. but it looked very similar to a normal plane and made a sound like a plane but not as loud as our planes that fly low. the lights were so bright, it was incredible. 

then the 3rd was exactly like the 1st. 

the lights were bright, and flashing. 

i know our planes have lights on them, but these had several lights, just guessing maybe like 20 -30 lights. 

i didn’t know what i was supposed to do. sadly i did not have my phone with me to take pictures. 
the objects were flying from south east to south west, in a sort of curve around the area i was in.
content.summary: 3 objects, 2 made no sound, 1 did, 2 upright, 1 horizontal, 20-30 lights each.

content.detailedDescription: Walking across the street with family to go visit someone and looking around as i am as usual. looked down the street and saw the black hexagonal, almost rectangular object hovering in the edge of a cloud, and descending on a 45 degree angle or appeared too. then i took cellphone out to take a picture but it was too late it descended enough that the trees hid the rest of it's path.
content.summary: Black hexagonal object

content.detailedDescription: this has stuck in my mind as a significant event because of its uniqueness but i have never seen a report of it so i am reporting it now. there are other living witnesses who were with me at the time who can corroborate this. for about 3 years in the early 60's i spent several weeks each summer at a friends house at virginia beach at 79th st off atlantic avenue. probably it was 1963 and probably august when my friend and i and his mother and sisters were on the beach just after dark having eaten a quick dinner at the seahorse inn. we noticed there were 4 large glowing plates, maybe 30 to 40 feet across (same size each) were doing aerial tricks maybe 100 feet offshore, rising 100 to 200 feet, hovering, then dropping to just maybe 25 or 50 feet above the water surface. i remember they were never quite eye level as i always was seeing the undersides of them. the objects flew in formation as if they were one object, but they were separate objects. they made no sound and i stuggled to look for specific markings on them but all i could see was the smooth surface emitting light evenly about as bright as a 40 watt fluorescent bulb or less and about the same coolness of white light as a fluorescent bulb (they emitted light but weren't too bright to look or stare at). they were definitely circular like plates and the edges were crisp. they were close enough so that you could see these were really like actual giant saucers. there were 100 or so witnesses on the beach and i noticed they were all staring dumbfounded at these things just like we were. it was a real curiosity. on many nights we had seen distant white lights on the horizon rising and dipping, literally on or just above the horizon (way out over the ocean), and they were not boat lights as we were familiar with them. until then we thought those lights were some kind of mirage effect and we just thought it was neat and mysterious. i still don't know if these were the same lights as those but i have a hunch it is possible they were, only closer. but after 10 minutes of this amazing aerial light show, my friend's mother suggested these could be ufos and that we might be in danger, so we all agreed to leave and went back to the house. i already had mentally identified them as ufos but didn't feel threatened because they kept their distance, but better safe than sorry (i did not want to be there actually if they decided to land). but was not in the news (paper or radio). my friends mother saw them the next night as well. i remember my friend told me she had told him that they 'had come back' again! even though i was 11 or 12 years old i knew this was not a natural phenomenon, and also that they were like nothing i had ever seen nor heard of except in the context of crazy ufo stories. i had tried as hard as i could to distinguish some detail, and also to hear a sound, but nothing, just the general surface emitted light was all smooth with no detail, and the sound of waves crashing. that's it. i felt it was odd because from there you could actually walk (a few miles if i remember correctly) to a naval base and there were a lot of witnesses seeing the same thing i described. i guess nobody reported it. there were no planes, heliocopters, or officals, police or anything that got involved. i would be interested if anyone else has reported this!
content.summary: 100 witnesses; after sundown on beach; 4 glowing plates in perdect formation 100 ft off shore- each 40 ft diameter; rose 100 ft fell to just above water; hovered quietly; after 10 minutes we left in fear of danger

content.detailedDescription: I was not going to report this for obvious reasons but then after some deliberation i decided to let you know what i witnessed as it was so strange i was visiting my daughter when i went outside her back door to smoke a cigarette it was a clear night and the stars were easily visible i observed a light moving towards the pole star i thaught at first it was the iss but hen just as the object passed the pole star it made a sudden 90 degree turn to the west and shot off at what must have been an impossible speed i am 58 years old and this is my first strange event i have witnessed i can only say after many years of scepticism it left my beliefs a little shaken
content.summary: Strange light in the sky moving north and a sudden change to the west

content.detailedDescription: Just notice small lights in the distance
content.summary: Distance lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking back from the store to get back to my appartment when i saw some orange lights above the electric power lines. at first i thought maybe there were some kind of locating device used if the lines were torned down but when i saw the lights start to move i changed my mind. i got my phone and tried to fly them as good as i could. the lights were not making any noise and in fact it was like there were no sounds at all around me.

i saw many lights that evening and sometimes there would be only one but sometimes there were in small packs and seemed to be going all in the same direction and disappear over the same bunch of trees on the front yard of the college next to my house.
content.summary: Strange orange lights in the sky but made no noise
